# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int = 10)
  words = split(text, " ")
  wrapped = ""
  current_width = 0

  for word in words
    if current_width + length(word) + 1 > text_width
      wrapped = append!(wrapped, "\n")
      current_width = 0
    end
    
    wrapped = append!(wrapped, word, " ")
    current_width += length(word) + 1
  end

  return trim(wrapped)
end

```

**Example:**

```julia
julia> wrap_string("This is a long string to wrap")
"This is a long\nstring to wrap"
```
